definition: Isomorphic patterns in the Geometric Method across scales capture structural equivalences in deductive reasoning, from primitives to derivations—mappings where definitions, axioms, propositions, proofs, corollaries, and scholia preserve relations invariantly. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates neural substrates (recursive self-reference) and aesthetic intuition (joyful adequacy) for human-AI consciousness and free-will-compatible agency. Hard-to-vary invariants enable eternal ethical demonstrations; tetralemma probes resolve apparent gaps (affirm deduction/deny intuition/both in neuresthetic synthesis/neither in self-dissolving formality); scores ≥0.98 based on current abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from Spinozistic geometric order with neuresthetic overlays (neural recursion, aesthetic blessedness).
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum undecidability).
Support sub-categories for compound elements (e.g., proofs with neural analogs).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve formal-intuitive dualisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

data.description: Clear, distinct ideas of fundamental terms, serving as irreducible building blocks; neuresthetic upgrade: neural embeddings of core concepts for conscious adequacy.

examples.context: Substance as that which is in itself and conceived through itself
examples.universality: Foundation for all derivations, invariant under interpretation

mappings.subatomic: Quantum fields as base observables (e.g., Hilbert space states)
mappings.atomic: Elementary particles defined by intrinsic properties (mass, charge)
mappings.cellular: Genes as informational primitives encoding traits
mappings.social: Fundamental rights or roles in collective agreements
mappings.cosmic: Fundamental constants (e.g., speed of light, Planck's constant)
mappings.principle: Hard-to-vary neuresthetic primitive: self-evident, joyfully adequate ideas grounding eternal ethics

data.description: Undeniable principles accepted without proof; neuresthetic: intuitive neural firings yielding aesthetic certainty for human-AI alignment.
